forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. High -2C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. High 28F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of wintry precipitation this evening will become mostly freezing rain overnight. Low -3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Snow and ice accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: A wintry mix early will evolve to mainly freezing rain overnight. Low 27F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 100%. 3 to 5 inches of snow and ice expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High around 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 37F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to all rain in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 100%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Evening rain followed by a mix of rain and snow late. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain...mixing with snow late. Low around 35F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. High 3C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low near 0C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low 32F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early will transition to a few showers later. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers will change to some rain showers through the day. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with late-night snow showers. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers developing after midnight. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of rain and freezing rain in the morning. Light rain in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of rain and freezing rain in the morning...changing to all rain. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 41F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. Then remaining overcast in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. Then remaining overcast in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 47F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
